name: Naughty Plush
description:
You play as Bruce. You're home alone and your brother Tim has left you a note in his room letting you know he's gone out and he won't be back 'til 2:30AM. What are you gonna get up to until then?

You can interact with items around the house.

Headphones are recommended, however, there are some sections of the game where you might need to turn up/down your volume if you either can't hear the sounds well or if the sounds are too loud for you.
